text: Ee () is a village in the Dutch province of Friesland. In 2020, 860 people lived there. Before 2019, the village was part of the municipality of Dongeradeel. It is part of the new municipality of Noardeast-Fryslân. Ee is the shortest place name in the Netherlands. Category:Settlements in Friesland Category:Noardeast-Fryslân
title: Ee, Netherlands
